comment: They changed the memories feature this Fall 2023 to be substantially worse. I used to love the memories at the top, now the dedicated menu at the bottom is so bad and doesn't have the 1 year ago, 2 years ago ... features I really used to enjoy.
scenarios: Attempt to view the "memories" feature, which has changed from being displayed at the top to a dedicated menu at the bottom.
Try to access the "1 year ago, 2 years ago..." feature within the "memories" that the user used to enjoy, which is now missing.
key sentence: Attempt to view the "memories" feature, which has changed from being displayed at the top to a dedicated menu at the bottom.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Add description', 'description': 'Add a description to memory.'}, {'name': 'Share Memory', 'description': 'Share memory.'}, {'name': 'Add photos', 'description': 'Add photos to memory'}]
